title: Jessie J cuts a casually chic figure in an oversized T-shirt and distressed jeans
text:
She's known for her quirky sense of style.

And Jessie J opted for another chic and eccentric ensemble on Thursday as she visited a nail salon in Los Angeles with a friend.

The Bang Bang singer, 31, struck a casual look in a white Vetements split T-shirt and distressed jeans.

Relaxed: Jessie J opted for another chic and eccentric ensemble on Thursday as she visited a nail salon in Los Angeles with a friend

Jessie's look was spiced up by a pair of tight white leather ankle-high boots and green nail varnish.

And a pair of cute heart-shaped earrings and a dash of bright red lipstick added to the singer's funky style.

She rounded off the ensemble with a black handbag featuring a silver chain strap.

Jessie was no doubt in Los Angeles to visit boyfriend, Channing Tatum who she has been dating for ten months.

Confident: The Bang Bang singer struck a casual look in a white Vetements split T-shirt and ripped jeans

Style: Jessie's look was spiced up by a pair of tight white leather ankle-high boots and green nail varnish

The songstress recently posted a loved-up Instagram snap of herself and Channing, 39, relaxing together in a tropical location.

Captioning the shot, the singer wrote: 'Missing this cuddle machine.'

Jessie and Channing first rubbed shoulders four years ago when she presented the actor with the Best Comedic Performance at the MTV Movie Awards in 2015.

It is not known how their love flourished or where they crossed paths before the duo embarked on a romance together in recent months.

Looking good: And a pair of cute heart-shaped earrings and a dash of bright red lipstick added to the singer's funky style

A good look: Jessie rounded off the ensemble with a black handbag featuring a silver chain strap

Channing announced his split from wife Jenna Dewan last April after nine years of marriage and an insider claimed that their split was down to their careers.

Jenna has since admitted that she 'felt blindsided' when she found out that her then estranged husband, Channing, was in a relationship with Jessie.

The dancer, 38, dished about the experience in her new book Gracefully You: Finding Beauty And Balance In The Everyday, per Radaronline.

'There I was, on a plane, alone, finding out about his new relationship,' she wrote. 'I felt blindsided.'

Silky gaze: Jessie was also pictured getting into her car after visiting the LA nail salon

Jenna found out just months after separating from Channing, 39, her husband of 10 years with whom she shares daughter Everly, six.

She said Channing didn't give her any advance notice that the news of his relationship with Jessie, 31, was about to break.

So she found out at the same time as the rest of the world, which she said was 'difficult.'

Initially, Jenna said she wrote Tweets about the situation she found herself in. But she opted not to post them. 'Instead of reacting the way I wanted…I asked myself this: How do I choose grace in this moment?' she said.

Meanwhile, a source told the New York Post's Page Six column that Jenna believed her husband wasn't working as hard as he should have on their relationship, whilst she was allegedly 'troubled' by the Magic Mike star's success.

The insider claimed: 'She is troubled by his success. He was turning down jobs because of her, and they were fighting a lot.'

I want you back: Jessie's outing comes after she posted a loved-up Instagram snap of her and Channing, 39, relaxing together in a tropical location

Explaining that the split was foreseeable as they had 'fallen out of love', the source added: 'Jenna always said they had to put work into their marriage to keep it alive, and while Channing is a great dad to their daughter, [Jenna] felt like he stopped wanting to work as hard on them as a married couple.'

They released a statement on Instagram that read: 'We have lovingly chosen to separate as a couple. We fell deeply in love so many years ago and have had a magical journey together.

'Absolutely nothing has changed about how much we love one another, but love is a beautiful adventure that is taking us on different paths for now.'
description: The Bang Bang singer, 31, struck a casual look in a white Vetements split t-shirt and ripped jeans. And Jessie's look was spiced up by a pair of tight white leather ankle-high boots and green nail varnish.
